content: this collection was put together as part of a washcloth wednesday event the event is now over but i may add more to the pattern in the future ♥ for each washcloth you will need oddments of dk weight cotton yarn a 3 50 mm hook and a needle for neatening ends when worked at the gauges each washcloth will measure 8 square instructions are also included for making the cloths larger or smaller as an alternative to cotton why not use a softer yarn - make a square a week and join into a blanket or throw hint if you re planning on joining several together leave approximately 60 cm 24 of yarn to the start and the finish for later you may not need it but better to be safe than sorry the event may re-open in the future and i will be announcing updates on my facebook 1 page and in decrease 2 here on ravelry i hope you enjoy the collection so far 1 https //www facebook com/thomasinacummingsdesigns 2 http //www ravelry com/groups/decrease
